contains_no_content_of_requested_type.description: Set to true if the input text contains no recipes. Otherwise, set to false.

entries.description: List of historical recipes extracted from text. If no recipes are found, return an empty array.

recipe_text_original.description: Complete recipe text verbatim in its original language (preserve spelling, diacritics, and formatting).

recipe_text_modern_english.description: Modern English translation of the complete recipe text. Use null if and only if the recipe is already in modern English.

title_original.description: Recipe title exactly as it appears in the source (preserve spelling and diacritics). Use null if no title is given.

title_modern_english.description: Modern English translation of the original recipe title. Use null if title_original is null or if the title is already in modern English.

recipe_type.description: Primary category of the recipe, following course- and purpose-based groupings found in historical cookery manuals.

ingredients.description: List of ingredients with original names, translations, quantities, and preparation notes. Return an empty array if no ingredients can be reliably separated.

name_original.description: Ingredient name as it appears in source (preserve spelling and diacritics).

name_modern_english.description: Modern English translation of the ingredient. Use null if name_original is null or if the ingredient is already given in modern English.

quantity_original.description: Quantity as recorded in source. Use null if not specified.

quantity_standardized_value.description: Numeric value of standardized quantity. Use null if cannot be standardized.

quantity_standardized_unit.description: Unit of standardized quantity. Use null if cannot be standardized.

preparation_note_original.description: How ingredient should be prepared, as recorded in source. Use null if none.

preparation_note_modern_english.description: Modern English translation of preparation note. Use null if none.

functional_role.description: Functional role of ingredient in the dish as inferred from recipe text.

luxury_signal_likert_1_7.description: 1 = common staple; 7 = strong luxury/status item in the context implied by the text and any additional context provided. Use null if unclear.

origin_explicitly_stated.description: If the recipe text explicitly states an origin (e.g., 'Spanish oil'), record verbatim. Null if none.

cooking_methods.description: Cooking techniques used in this recipe with original terms and translations. Return empty array if none are mentioned.

method_original.description: Cooking method as it appears in source (preserve spelling).

method_modern_english.description: Modern English translation of the cooking method.

utensils_equipment.description: Cooking tools and equipment mentioned in the recipe. Return empty array if none are mentioned.

utensil_original.description: Utensil as it appears in source (preserve spelling).

utensil_modern_english.description: Modern English translation of the utensil.

yield.description: Yield information with original and modern English versions. Return empty array if not specified.

value_original.description: Numeric value of yield as recorded. Use null if not specified.

unit_original.description: Unit of yield as recorded in source. Use null if not specified.

value_modern_english.description: Numeric value of yield (typically same as original). Use null if not specified.

unit_modern_english.description: Modern English translation of yield unit. Use null if not specified.

preparation_time.description: Preparation time with original and modern English versions. Return empty array if not specified.

value_original.description: Numeric value of preparation time as recorded. Use null if not specified or non-numeric.

unit_original.description: Unit of preparation time as recorded in source. Use null if not specified.

value_modern_english.description: Numeric value of preparation time (typically same as original). Use null if not specified or non-numeric.

unit_modern_english.description: Modern English translation of time unit. Use null if not specified.

cooking_time.description: Cooking time with original and modern English versions. Return empty array if not specified.

value_original.description: Numeric value of cooking time as recorded. Use null if not specified or non-numeric.

unit_original.description: Unit of cooking time as recorded in source. Use null if not specified.

value_modern_english.description: Numeric value of cooking time (typically same as original). Use null if not specified or non-numeric.

unit_modern_english.description: Modern English translation of time unit. Use null if not specified.

ingredient_categories.description: Boolean flags indicating whether the recipe contains specific categories of historical ingredients.

contains_meat.description: True if the recipe contains meat (beef, pork, lamb, game, etc.).

contains_poultry.description: True if the recipe contains poultry (chicken, duck, goose, etc.).

contains_fish_seafood.description: True if the recipe contains fish or seafood.

contains_dairy.description: True if the recipe contains dairy products (milk, cheese, cream, etc.).

contains_eggs.description: True if the recipe contains eggs.

contains_butter.description: True if the recipe specifically contains butter.

contains_olive_oil.description: True if the recipe specifically contains olive oil.

contains_lard_animal_fat.description: True if the recipe contains lard or other animal fats that are not butter.

contains_alcohol.description: True if the recipe contains alcoholic beverages (wine, beer, spirits, etc.).

contains_refined_sugar.description: True if the recipe contains refined sugar.

contains_honey.description: True if the recipe contains honey.

contains_other_sweeteners.description: True if the recipe contains other sweeteners that are neither honey nor refined sugar.

contains_foreign_spices.description: True if the recipe contains imported exotic spices (pepper, cinnamon, cloves, nutmeg, ginger, saffron, etc.).

contains_luxury_ingredients.description: True if the recipe contains luxury or high-status ingredients (truffles, caviar, exotic fruits, expensive cuts, etc.).

culinary_style.description: Culinary style/era signals derived from the recipe text.

modernity_likert_1_7.description: 1 = late-medieval style; 7 = mature haute cuisine after strong La Varenne/Carême-style influence. Null if unclear.

innovation_markers_observed.description: Markers detected in the text itself. Empty if none detected.

enum: Egg or cream liaison for finishing
Mise en place or advance prep mentioned

archaism_markers_observed.description: Markers suggesting older culinary style. Empty if none detected.

enum: Heavy mixed spicing (cinnamon + pepper + ginger etc.)
Whole roast or spit-based method dominant

evidence_quote.description: Short verbatim snippet (original language; ideally ≤150 characters) supporting the classification. Null if no single snippet suffices.

intertextuality.description: Signals of attribution, foreign-style referencing, and within-book cross-referencing.

explicit_source_attribution.description: If the text explicitly names a source/authority, record verbatim. Null if none.

explicit_foreign_style_reference.description: If the text explicitly names a foreign style or national manner, record verbatim. Null if none.

cross_reference_to_other_recipe.description: True if recipe references another recipe/section in the same work. Null if unclear.

contains_embedded_subrecipe.description: True if the recipe contains a full sub-procedure that could stand alone (e.g., a sauce/farce/paste described in detail). Null if unclear.

self_positioning_temporal.description: How the recipe positions itself in culinary time.

evidence_quote.description: Short verbatim snippet supporting the intertextuality classification.

assumed_skill_level_likert_1_7.description: 1 = assumes novice; 7 = assumes trained professional. Null if unclear.

assumed_resource_level_likert_1_7.description: 1 = minimal kitchen/resources; 7 = very well-resourced kitchen/household. Null if unclear.

explanatory_density_likert_1_7.description: 1 = terse/telegraphic; 7 = highly detailed and pedagogical. Null if unclear.

evidence_quote.description: Short verbatim snippet supporting the social-context inference.

aspiration_practice.description: LLM-inferred display orientation, feasibility, and occasion signals.

display_orientation_likert_1_7.description: 1 = purely practical; 7 = maximal display/status orientation. Null if unclear.

feasibility_for_ordinary_household_liker.description: 1 = implausible for ordinary household; 7 = easily feasible. Null if unclear.

occasion_type.description: Occasion signals detected. Empty array if none detected.

economy_framing_present.description: True if explicitly framed as economical/thrifty. Null if unclear.

luxury_framing_present.description: True if explicitly framed as luxurious/splendid/delicate. Null if unclear.

evidence_quote.description: Short verbatim snippet supporting the aspiration/practice inference.

geographic_signals.description: Places and regional identity cues explicitly present in the recipe text.

place_references.description: Places explicitly named in recipe text. Empty if none.

place_name_original.description: Place name exactly as in the text.

regional_identity_strength_likert_1_7.description: 1 = no regional marking; 7 = strongly marked regional identity. Null if unclear.

dialect_or_local_terminology_detected.description: True if the text uses dialect/local terminology. Null if unclear.

evidence_quote.description: Short verbatim snippet supporting the geographic-signal extraction.

tradition_rhetoric.description: Rhetorical markers relevant for debates on authenticity, tradition, and identity (often sparse at recipe-level).

tradition_claim_present.description: True if the recipe text claims tradition/old custom. Null if unclear.

authenticity_claim_present.description: True if the recipe text claims authenticity/genuineness/originality. Null if unclear.

national_identity_claim_present.description: True if the recipe text invokes national identity explicitly. Null if unclear.

anti_foreign_sentiment_present.description: True if the recipe text disparages foreign cuisine or asserts native superiority. Null if unclear.

moral_virtue_framing_present.description: True if recipe framing includes moral language (virtue of frugality, temperance, avoiding excess). Null if unclear.

evidence_quote.description: Short verbatim snippet supporting the rhetoric classification.

economic_signals.description: Explicit cost/scarcity/substitution and economy cues in the recipe text.

cost_language_present.description: True if mentions cost, expense, cheapness, or affordability. Null if unclear.

scarcity_language_present.description: True if mentions scarcity, availability constraints, seasonality, or difficulty obtaining. Null if unclear.

substitutions.description: Explicit substitutions ('or use Y instead of X'). Empty if none.

leftover_usage_mentioned.description: True if explicitly mentions leftovers or yesterday's food. Null if unclear.

evidence_quote.description: Short verbatim snippet supporting the economic-signal extraction.

luxury_signals.description: Luxury/prestige signaling inferred from ingredients, labor, and explicit framing in the recipe text.

luxury_intensity_likert_1_7.description: 1 = no luxury signaling; 7 = maximal prestige display. Null if unclear.

luxury_type_observed.description: Types of luxury signaling detected. Empty if none detected.

global_trade_goods_prominent.description: True if global trade goods are prominent beyond incidental seasoning. Null if unclear.

evidence_quote.description: Short verbatim snippet supporting the luxury-signal extraction.

sensory_emphasis.description: Sensory and aesthetic emphasis detectable in the recipe text.

taste_emphasis_likert_1_7.description: 1 = taste barely mentioned; 7 = extensive taste description/adjustment language. Null if unclear.

appearance_emphasis_likert_1_7.description: 1 = appearance unmentioned; 7 = detailed presentation/plating emphasis. Null if unclear.

texture_emphasis_likert_1_7.description: 1 = texture unmentioned; 7 = explicit texture goals and cues. Null if unclear.

aroma_emphasis_present.description: True if aroma/fragrance is mentioned as goal/indicator. Null if unclear.

color_as_goal_present.description: True if achieving a specific color is an explicit goal. Null if unclear.

evidence_quote.description: Short verbatim snippet supporting the sensory-emphasis extraction.

health_medical_framing.description: Health/medical framing signals, including humoral reasoning where present.

health_purpose_stated.description: True if explicitly for health/invalids/convalescents/conditions. Null if unclear.

humoral_reasoning_present.description: True if uses hot/cold, moist/dry, temperament language, or similar humoral framing. Null if unclear.

digestibility_mentioned.description: True if discusses digestibility/lightness. Null if unclear.

specific_condition_targeted.description: If a specific condition is named, record verbatim. Null if none.

evidence_quote.description: Short verbatim snippet supporting the health/medical framing extraction.

textual_structure.description: LLM characterization of how the recipe is written (structure and precision ethos).

precision_ethos_likert_1_7.description: 1 = vague throughout; 7 = precise throughout. Null if unclear.

imperative_voice_dominant.description: True if primarily imperative verbs. Null if unclear.

reader_addressed_directly.description: True if addresses reader directly ('you will', 'if you prefer'). Null if unclear.

evidence_quote.description: Short verbatim snippet supporting the textual-structure classification.

labor_time_signals.description: Implicit labor and time horizon signals inferred from the recipe text.

labor_intensity_likert_1_7.description: 1 = minimal labor; 7 = extreme labor/multi-stage/continuous attention. Null if unclear.

time_horizon_implied.description: Inferred total time horizon, even if not explicitly stated.

advance_preparation_required.description: True if requires advance prep (soaking, marinating, curing). Null if unclear.

continuous_attention_required.description: True if requires continuous tending/stirring/watching. Null if unclear.

evidence_quote.description: Short verbatim snippet supporting the labor/time inference.

religious_calendar_signals.description: Religious/ritual calendar signals in the recipe text (fasting, Lent, feast days, etc.).

fasting_context_indicated.description: True if marked for fasting days/Lent/vigils/etc. Null if unclear.

meat_day_context_indicated.description: True if marked for meat days or explicitly non-fasting. Null if unclear.

specific_feast_or_holiday_named.description: If a specific feast/holiday is named (e.g., Christmas, Easter), record verbatim. Null if none.

confessional_hint.description: Only classify if text contains explicit markers.

evidence_quote.description: Short verbatim snippet supporting the religious/calendar inference.

extraction_audit.description: Lightweight auditability fields. Keep evidence quotes short and verbatim. Do not include chain-of-thought.

confidence_overall.description: Overall self-assessed confidence (0.00–1.00). Null if not provided.

evidence_quotes_original.description: Short verbatim snippets supporting key classifications. Empty if none.

ambiguity_notes.description: Short notes on ambiguities (no chain-of-thought). Empty if none.
